title: I just wanted to share that I cast my mail in ballot today!!
selftext:
not sure if this is the right place to post, but in 2016, I wasn’t old enough to vote. I’m so excited to be able to vote now and sent my absentee ballot back to my state’s office today. I’m hopeful there will be more of a turnout this year with younger voters like myself ✊🏻

It feels good to be able to contribute!
